scripts.update-react-ui: npm run pack-given-client-libs @haulmont/jmix-react-ui && npm run update-given-client-libs example-react-app react-ui
scripts.update-react-core: npm run pack-given-client-libs @haulmont/jmix-react-core && npm run update-given-client-libs example-react-app react-core
scripts.update-react-core-and-ui: npm run pack-given-client-libs @haulmont/jmix-react-ui @haulmont/jmix-react-core && npm run update-given-client-libs example-react-app react-core react-ui
scripts.update-react-ide-toolbox: npm run pack-given-client-libs @haulmont/react-ide-toolbox && npm run update-given-client-libs example-react-app react-ide-toolbox
scripts.bootstrap-react-app: npm run generate-react-app && npm run update-react-client-libs
scripts.bootstrap-react-lite: npm run generate-react-app && npm run update-react-core-and-ui
scripts.start-react-app-dev-mode: REACT_APP_IDE_DEVMODE=true PORT=3016 npm run start --prefix example-react-app
scripts.react-all: npm run bootstrap-react-app && npm run bootstrap-jmix-app && npm run start-jmix-app && npm run start-react-app
scripts.react-native-all: npm run bootstrap-react-native-app && npm run bootstrap-jmix-app && npm run start-jmix-app && npm run start-react-native-app
scripts.test:all: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: echo 'UNIT TESTS AND COVERAGE' && lerna run coverage
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'PUPPETEER E2E TESTS' && npm test example-react-app/ --prefix test-pup
scripts.snyk:wizard-scr: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 && node scripts/audit/snyk.js wizard example-react-app true .snyk-example-react-app
scripts.validate-react-app: prettier --check example-react-app/**/*.ts && CI=true npm test --prefix example-react-app
